fxwindow.fxresize

Class FXResize

  • java.lang.Object
    • fxwindow.fxresize.FXResize

  • public class FXResize
extends java.lang.Object

    This class allows to resize your undecorated window

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ivan Zhen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FXResize()
      Creates empty FXResize object.
      FXResize(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root)
      Creates FXResize object with root element of stage.
      FXResize(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root, javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneUp, javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneRight, javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneDown, javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneLeft)
      Creates FXResize object with root element of stage and vertical and horizontal panes for resizing the window.
      FXResize(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root, javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneUp, javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneRight, javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneDown, javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneLeft, javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneUpLeft, javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneUpRight, javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneDownRight, javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneDownLeft)
      Creates FXResize object with root element of stage and vertical, horizontal and diagonal panes for resizing the window.

      • FXResize

        public FXResize(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root)
        Creates FXResize object with root element of stage.

      • FXResize

        public FXResize(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root,
                javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneUp,
                javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneRight,
                javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneDown,
                javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneLeft)
        Creates FXResize object with root element of stage and vertical and horizontal panes for resizing the window.
        Parameters:
        root - Root element of the stage as AnchorPane.
        paneUp - Pane element of the stage for resize to up.
        paneRight - Pane element of the stage for resize to right.
        paneDown - Pane element of the stage for resize to down.
        paneLeft - Pane element of the stage for resize to left.

      • FXResize

        public FXResize(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root,
                javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneUp,
                javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneRight,
                javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneDown,
                javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneLeft,
                javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneUpLeft,
                javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneUpRight,
                javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneDownRight,
                javafx.scene.layout.Pane paneDownLeft)
        Creates FXResize object with root element of stage and vertical, horizontal and diagonal panes for resizing the window.
        Parameters:
        root - Root element of the stage as AnchorPane.
        paneUp - Pane element of the stage for resize to up.
        paneRight - Pane element of the stage for resize to right.
        paneDown - Pane element of the stage for resize to down.
        paneLeft - Pane element of the stage for resize to left.
        paneUpLeft - Pane element of the stage for resize to up and left.
        paneUpRight - Pane element of the stage for resize to up and right.
        paneDownRight - Pane element of the stage for resize to down and right.
        paneDownLeft - Pane element of the stage for resize to down and left.
